incident_updates.body: We are currently investigating an issue that is resulting in Workflow Actions delays for a limited number of customers. Specifically, the issue is preventing the Google “Transfer All Drive Files” Action from completing as expected, and is delaying the subsequent actions in the impacted workflows as a result. At the moment, we're working to determine root cause, and we've asked our partners at Google to look into a potential issue; however, we are working to mitigate the impact on our customers. We will provide additional updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

We have resolved the issue related to Box integrations for some customers. Box integrations are now functioning as expected. We apologize for any inconvenience. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team at support@bettercloud.com.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are investigating an issue with the Box integration in relation to validating tokens. We are investigating the issue and will post another update as soon as possible.  We apologize for any inconvenience. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team at support@bettercloud.com or feel free to open a chat from your BetterCloud instance.

We have resolved the issue that affected Salesforce user syncs for a limited number of customers in BetterCloud, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue that affected Salesforce user syncs for a limited number of customers in BetterCloud, and we are monitoring to ensure that everything is back to normal. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have identified an issue that may be affecting Salesforce user syncs for a limited number of customers in BetterCloud. Our team is actively working toward a resolution and we will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that may be affecting Salesforce integration user syncs for a limited number of customers. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Directory delays for Dropbox, Microsoft 365, Slack, and Okta

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was affecting directory syncs for Dropbox, Microsoft 365, Slack, and Okta for a small subset of customers, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have implemented a fix for the issue that was affecting directory syncs for Dropbox, Microsoft 365, Slack, and Okta for a small subset of customers. We are monitoring to ensure directory syncs are now operating as expected. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that may be affecting directory syncs for Dropbox, Microsoft 365, Slack, and Okta for a small subset of customers. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

We are remediating the issue resulting in the suspension of a limited number of user’s O365 integration. All impacted customers have received email notifications and are advised to reconnect their integrations. We will provide further updates as they become available. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with if you have any questions.

We have received reports indicating that some O365 integrations may be disconnecting unexpectedly. We are currently investigating the issue. We will provide further updates as more details become available. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with any questions or concerns.

We have continued to monitor this issue and have determined that Zoom data syncs in app.bettercloud.com are now operating as expected. We are moving this incident to a Resolved state. 

A subset of affected customers will need to reconnect their Zoom Integration with valid credentials. Those customers will receive an email from notifications@bettercloud.com within the next 24 hours asking them to reconnect their Zoom Integration. 

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions

We have identified and fixed the issue impacting Zoom data syncs for the majority customers in app.bettercloud.com. Zoom data is now syncing in normally and we are monitoring our system for stability. 

Our investigation revealed that for a subset of impacted customers Zoom Integrations were not syncing correctly. Those customers will need to reconnect their Zoom Integration with valid credentials. Those customers will receive an email from support@bettercloud.com within the next 24 hours asking them to reconnect their Zoom Integration.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions

We are currently investigating an issue impacting some Zoom data syncs in app.bettercloud.com. Customers may experience delays in their Zoom data syncing in. We apologize for any inconvenience and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.
This incident has been resolved.

Due to a Salesforce outage, our in-app chat widget and help center may be intermittently unavailable at this time. To reach our Support team, please email support@bettercloud.com. Please note that responses may be delayed until our Salesforce access is restored. We will provide updates here as more information becomes available.

We have resolved the issue that was affecting Custom Triggers. All workflows are triggering and functioning as expected. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have identified and implemented a fix for an issue that was affecting Custom Triggers. All other workflows are triggering and functioning as expected. We are monitoring to ensure the successful resolution of this issue. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have resolved the issue that was causing Workflow Actions to be delayed for some customers. Workflow Action traffic is now processing as expected. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com.

We are working to resolve the issue that is causing Workflow Actions to be delayed for some customers. We are currently monitoring for stability and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have identified an issue that is causing Workflow Actions delays for some customers. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

We are experiencing an issue with our in-app chat support widget in app.bettercloud.com. Until it's fixed, you can reach our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com. We will update this incident as soon as we have more information.

We have resolved the issue that was resulting in stalled workflows following the occurrence of failed actions. Any affected workflows have been resubmitted. You may notice a duplicate workflow with a separate timestamp that will complete as intended, and the original workflow will be marked as "completed with errors". Please review workflow history to ensure completion to the actions. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue that causing workflow processing delays after failed workflow actions. The impacted workflows will fail and be reprocessed as a new instance. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com.

We have identified the issue impacting a limited number of customers where some workflow processing is delayed following the occurrence of failed actions issue causing a subset of workflows to stall in BetterCloud. Our team is actively working toward a resolution and we will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com.

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting a limited number of customers where some workflow processing is delayed following the occurrence of failed actions. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We've monitored this issue overnight and determined that our OneLogin syncs are operating as intended. We are moving this incident to a Resolved state. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

We have identified the the OneLogin sync issue and have made changes to  address it. We are currently monitoring sync performance to ensure that the OneLogin syncs are operating as intended. We will post another update as we continue monitoring. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

We are currently investigating an issue impacting some OneLogin data syncs in app.bettercloud.com. Customers may experience delays in their OneLogin data syncing in, which could result in OneLogin based Alerts and Workflows to trigger and complete/execute at a delay. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions
The delayed Workflow emails have been reprocessed. This incident has been resolved. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are working to ensure all Workflow emails that were sent on 9/29/22 between ~7:30AM ET and ~7:30PM ET due to this incident are reprocessed, including emails sent by Send Email, Wait for Approval, Workflow Notifications, Reset Password, and Generate 2 Factor Codes actions. Please note that as we reprocess the delayed emails, some users may receive duplicates of emails that were already sent. Moving forward, email functionality has been restored and should be working as expected. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have identified and remediated the root cause of the issue affecting BetterCloud emails. Workflow notifications and emails sent by the “Send Email” and “Wait for Approval” actions will be delivered at a delay. We expect to have this resolved soon. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have resolved the underlying issue that was affecting Microsoft 365 file syncs, Dropbox file syncs, and Discover syncs. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently investigating an issue that is affecting Microsoft 365 file syncs, Dropbox file syncs, Google file syncs, and Discover syncs for a limited number of customers. Workflows and alerts that are related to these syncs may be impacted.  We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have resolved the issue causing Workflow Actions to be delayed in executing for some customers. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have identified the issue causing Workflow Actions to be delayed in executing for some customers. We are working a fix to resolve this issue as soon as possible, and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is causing Workflow Actions delays for some customers. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Discover Application UI Not Loading Properly

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI. We will continue to monitor the performance. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue that was impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI, and we are monitoring to ensure that everything is back to normal. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have identified an issue that is impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI.  Our team is actively working towards a resolution. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI.  We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Discover Application UI Not Loading Properly

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was affecting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI.  We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Workflow delays and Workflow manage inconsistancy

incident_updates.body:
We have monitored the system overnight and Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers remain stable. The Workflow Builder and Manager page remain stable as well. 

We are moving this incident to a "Resolved" state. If you have any questions, please contact Support by reaching out to support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue. Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers are triggering normally and the workflow builder and manage pages are loads properly. We are continuing to monitor the performance to ensure that everything is back to normal. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is resulting in an intermittent failure to load that has a limited impacted on the the workflow builder and manage page. Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers may be delayed. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are moving this incident to a resolved state after monitoring for stability throughout the day. Thank you for your patience. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

Workflows were processing normally as of 2:30AM EST. We are continuing to monitor for any further issues to ensure system stability. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have implemented a fix and Workflows are now processing as expected for the customers who were affected. We will continue monitoring this issue for the next several hours and provide another update at 9:00AM EST. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are investigating an issue that is causing Workflows to be delayed in executing for some customers. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have resolved the issue that was the UI portion of the Data Protection section in app.bettercloud.com, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently investigating an issue that is affecting the UI portion of the Data Protection section in app.bettercloud.com. Please note that the workflows and alerts are continuing to perform as expected. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

This incident has been resolved as of 12:30PM EST. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

We are investigating an issue that is causing specific Workflow Actions to be delayed in execution. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

incidents.name: Delay in Workflows and Workflow Actions

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are investigating an issue that is causing Workflows and Workflow Actions to be delayed in execution. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

We are continuing to investigate and monitor the performance of the Box file syncs and will provide updates as needed. If you have any questions, please contact our Support team: support@bettercloud.com.

We have implemented a fix that has remediated a known Box file sync issue. We are still investigating whether there might be other Box file sync issues that require remediation. We will continue to provide updates here. If you have any questions, please contact our Support team: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting Box syncs, which may include Box files or folder syncs. This issue only affects a subset of customers with Box integrations. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update once available. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

Due to a Salesforce outage, our in-app chat widget and help center may be intermittently unavailable at this time. To reach our Support team, please email support@bettercloud.com. Please note that responses will be delayed until our Salesforce access is restored. We will provide updates here as more information becomes available.

We have concluded our investigation and determined that the issue impacting OneLogin data syncs in app.bettercloud.com has been resolved.  

Customers may have experienced intermittent issues with OneLogin data syncing into app.bettercloud.com between 6/28/22 and 7/15/22, which could have affected OneLogin based Alerts and Workflows from triggering or completing successfully.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

We are currently investigating an issue impacting OneLogin data syncs in app.bettercloud.com. Customers may experience delays in their OneLogin data syncing in, which could affect OneLogin based Alerts and Workflows from triggering or completing successfully. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

incidents.name: Workflow Builder and Action Menu Outage

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are currently investigating an issue affecting the loading of the Workflow Builder and Actions menu. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update by 1:30pm ET. Please reach out to our Support team with any questions or concerns.

incidents.name: Certain Event Based Workflows Not Triggering Accordingly

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was affecting event-based workflows, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue that was affecting event-based workflows, this does not include custom triggers and on-demand workflows, and we are monitoring to ensure that everything is back to normal. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

A fix has been implemented and the Triggered Alerts interface is loading as expected. We are monitoring to ensure there is continued system stability. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with any questions or concerns.

We are currently investigating an issue that is preventing the Triggered Alerts interface from loading. We will provide another update by 4:30pm ET. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with any questions or concerns.
The Salesforce outage is resolved. Our in-app chat widget and help center have resumed normal operation. You can read more about the incident on Salesforce's Trust site.

Due to a Salesforce outage, our in-app chat widget and help center may be intermittently unavailable at this time. To reach our Support team, please email support@bettercloud.com. Please note that responses will be delayed until our Salesforce access is restored. We will provide updates here as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Intermittent errors on Box and Workday Syncs | Intermittent errors loading Workflow Builder

incident_updates.body:
Earlier today, we identified an issue impacting Box and Workday syncs, and the Workflow Builder in app.bettercloud.com. We have now addressed the underlying issue affecting these functionalities, have monitored for stability, and are marking this incident as resolved.

During the incident, customers may have experienced intermittent service errors when trying to create, save, or update a Workflow. Some customer may have also experienced failed Box and Workday syncs. For these customers, the updated Box and Workday data will sync in on the next successful sync, or within 24 hours.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have cause. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

incidents.name: UX issue impacting a limited number of Customers

incident_updates.body: Earlier today our team identified and resolved an issue causing certain UX issues for a limited number of customers. We monitored our systems and the issue has been fixed. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We have monitored our system performance over the past few hours and this issue has been resolved. Please note that the processing of some Syncs, Alerts, or Workflows may be temporarily delayed as we continue to process the traffic accumulated during the incident. Please reach out to our support team if you have any questions or concerns by emailing support@bettercloud.com.

We have fixed the issue impacting app.bettercloud.com and currently monitoring for stability. Sync, Alerts, and Workflows impacted during this incident will resume processing as expected. Please note that the processing will be temporarily delayed as we process the traffic accumulated during the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience this issue has caused. Please reach out to our support team if you have any questions or concerns by emailing support@bettercloud.com.

We have identified and are investigating an issue impacting app.bettercloud.com which is currently delaying the completion of Syncs, Alerts, and Workflows. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions

We have resolved the issue that was impacting the workflow successes, and the workflow manage and edit page. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting workflows completion, and the Workflow manage and edit page. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: User Creation in BetterCloud for G Suite

incident_updates.body: The issue causing intermittent errors when creating users in g.bettercloud.com has been resolved. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Support team at support@bettercloud.com.

We are aware of and investigating an issue that is causing errors when users are created in BetterCloud for G Suite (g.bettercloud.com). Click here for proposed workarounds and more information. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our Support team.

App performance has been stable during this monitoring period, and we are now moving this incident to a "Resolved" state. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused.  If you have any questions, please contact support@bettercloud.com
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Our team identified a short UI outage. This affected the Dashboard View, Directory Grids, Alerts, and Workflows UIs. Our team has identified the root cause, resolved the issue, and we are back to a working state. Our team will continue to monitor the situation. If you have any issues or concerns please reach out to support@bettercloud.com.

incidents.name: Targeted Content Scans Slow to Complete

incident_updates.body: Targeted content scans in app.bettercloud.com have now been restored. We apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have caused.  If you have any questions, please contact our support  team at support@bettercloud.com

We have identified an issue impacting the successful completion of targeted content scans in app.bettercloud.com. We will provide an update in 60 minutes. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Errors with Zoom Alerts + Workflows in BetterCloud

incident_updates.body: Zoom actions triggered from Zoom-based Alerts in BetterCloud have been completing successfully during the monitoring period. This issue is now resolved, thank you for your patience. If you have any questions, please contact support@bettercloud.com

We have deployed a fix to resolve the issues causing Zoom actions in BetterCloud. We are now monitoring to ensure that the affected Zoom actions work as expected. If you have any questions, please contact support@bettercloud.com

We are investigating and have identified an issue resulting in Zoom actions that are triggered from Zoom-based Alerts in BetterCloud to fail in our platform. We are currently working on a fix for this issue. If you have any questions, please contact support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Discover based Workflows are not Working

incident_updates.body: Discover Alert based Alerts and Workflows have continued to work as expected throughout the monitoring period. Thank you for your patience, and we apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

We have released a fix and Discover based Alerts and Workflows are working as expected. Thank you for your patience. We will continue monitoring to ensure Discover functionality is working correctly. If you have any questions, please contact the BetterCloud Support team at support@bettercloud.com

We have identified the root issue that is impacting Discover based Alerts and Workflows and have made progress towards a resolution. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing, and will provide more updates on our status page as we continue. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting Discover based Alerts and Workflows. At this time, Workflows configured with Discover Alerts are not taking action on the target of the Workflow. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing and will provide updates on our status page. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Actions Menu Not Loading in Files Grid

incident_updates.body: We have identified and resolved the issues impacting the Action menu in the Files grid in app.bettercloud.com. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the loading of the Action menu in the Files grid in app.bettercloud.com. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

Alerts and Alerts-based Workflows are now triggering normally. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

Alerts and Alerts-based Workflows are continuing to trigger at a delay while we work to process a backlog of events. We will continue to provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. Affected workflows can be run on-demand as a workaround. If you have any questions, please contact the BetterCloud Support Team.

We have identified an issue that is causing Alerts and Alerts-based Workflows to trigger at a delay. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. Until then, affected workflows can be run on-demand as a workaround. If you have any questions, please contact the BetterCloud Support Team.

incidents.name: Log4j or “log4shell” Security Vulnerabilities Investigation and Remediation Update

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

To our knowledge the “log4j” CVE-2021-44228 security vulnerability has not been exploited in our application environment. We are, of course, continuing to assess the BetterCloud systems, tools, and vendors for impact related to the vulnerability and continuing to monitor new developments on log4j.

For the most recent information on our log4j investigation and remediation efforts, please visit www.bettercloud.com/log4j-updates.

We have identified the root cause of the Workflow delays and have released a fix. Traffic is now processing normally. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are currently looking into an issue that may cause Workflow Actions to be delayed for some customers. We will provide another update as soon as more information is available. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

Though the AWS incident is still ongoing, we have been monitoring BetterCloud Workflows all afternoon to ensure stability. We are going to tentatively mark this incident as "Resolved", but will continue to monitor BetterCloud Workflows until the AWS incident is fully resolved and update our status page if needed. If you experience any Workflow delays, please contact our Support team at support@bettercloud.com.

We have resolved all Workflow delays stemming from the AWS outage and will continue to monitor our system until the AWS outage is completely resolved (for addition information regarding the AWS outage, please visit: https://status.aws.amazon.com/).
If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com.

We have identified that the current AWS outage affecting Slack is causing Workflow delays in app.bettercloud.com (for additional information please visit: https://status.aws.amazon.com/). Customers may experience delays in Workflows completing until this issue is resolved by AWS. 

If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

Alert SMS and email notifications are temporarily not sending and will be delayed until this incident is resolved. As an alternative, Alert notifications can be sent through Workflows using Slack or Email. If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

The Files grid loading issue is now resolved. No further loading issues were observed since the fix. Thank you for your patience. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com
The Files grid is now loading consistently. We are monitoring to ensure that it continues to do so. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating intermittent loading issues with the Files grid in BetterCloud. We will provide an update in 60 minutes. If you have any questions, please contact support at support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

Auth0 has restored their service: https://status.auth0.com/ We are monitoring to ensure continued stability. BetterCloud users should be able to log in normally. If you are experiencing any difficulties logging into our platform, please contact our Support team at support@bettercloud.com.

We are currently experiencing an incident where customers are unable to login to app.bettercloud.com due to an Auth0 outage: https://status.auth0.com/incidents/2mstm0ylgvfn

Customers may experience issues logging into app.bettercloud.com until this issue is fixed by Auth0
This incident has been resolved.
BetterCloud continues to be stable as we monitor for any further issues. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
BetterCloud functionality remains stable. We are continuing to monitor and will provide another update by 3PM ET. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
BetterCloud functionality remains stable. We are continuing to monitor and will provide another update by 1PM ET. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

Performance has improved since yesterday's maintenance. We are continuing to monitor for any further issues and will provide another update by 11AM ET. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

The scheduled maintenance has been completed. We will continue monitoring our systems for stability and provide another update by tomorrow, December 14th, at 10AM ET. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

We have determined that emergency maintenance will be needed to restore functionality. To minimize customer impact, this maintenance will be conducted outside of business hours between 9:00PM EST and 10:00PM EST on December 13. During this time, Alerts and Workflows will continue to trigger as expected, but ability to log into and use the app.bettercloud.com interface will be limited. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

We are in the process of deploying a fix for the issue that is causing intermittent errors loading Workflows and Actions. We will continue to monitor once the fix is deployed and provide another update at 3:00PM EST. 

If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

We are still investigating a fix for an issue that is causing intermittent errors in app.bettercloud.com. 

We have determined that in addition to errors loading Workflows, errors could also be observed when loading Actions from the Directory grid. 

We will post another update in 60 minutes (2:00PM EST). If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

We are investigating an issue that is causing intermittent errors when loading Workflows and a fix is in progress for this issue. We will post another update in 60 minutes. If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

At this time we have completed an analysis to identify the places where we currently believe that the “log4j” CVE-2021-44228 security vulnerability may exist within our application environments. We believe we have found all instances that potentially are vulnerable and have already released code to mitigate and fix. We are continuing to monitor our environment to ensure everything is working as intended and there are no other vulnerabilities.

Please direct any additional questions to support@bettercloud.com
BetterCloud Alert SMS notifications are now sending again. Thanks for your patience. If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

Alert SMS notifications are temporarily not sending. We are working on a fix for this issue. In the meanwhile, Alert notifications can be sent through Workflows using Slack or Email. If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Intermittent errors when loading Workflows and Integration Center

incident_updates.body: The intermittent loading errors have not resurfaced since the code changes were released. Workflows and Integration Center are loading as expected. Thank you for your patience. If you have any questions, please

The loading errors in Workflows and Integration Center have not appeared since the recent code changes. We are continuing to monitor to confirm this incident has been resolved. If you have any questions, please
We are continuing to monitor the results of the recent code changes. We will provide another update by 2 PM ET at the latest. If you have any questions, please
We have implemented two changes that we expect to alleviate this issue and we are monitoring the results. We will provide another update by 1PM ET at the latest. If you have any questions, please

We have identified an issue that is causing intermittent errors when loading Workflows, the Actions menu, and Integration Center. We have a fix in progress that we expect to resolve these errors. We will post another update in 60 minutes. If you have any questions, please contact the support team at support@bettercloud.com
